title: "Israeli researchers use artificial intelligence to identify cancer genes"
excerpt: "For the first time in the world, researchers at Hadassah Hospital in Jerusalem have developed an artificial intelligence algorithm to identify mutations that cause cancer. The discovery is considered an important breakthrough in cancer research."
